TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit SamlAdvice extends System.Object

summary.span: 表示 SAML 断言中的 元素，包含 SAML 授权机构提供的附加信息。

span.span: Represents the element within a SAML assertion that contains additional information provided by the SAML authority.

remarks.format: ## Remarks SAML 断言中的 `` 元素是 SAML 令牌的扩展点。The `` element within a SAML assertion is an extension point for SAML tokens. 提供有关颁发 SAML 断言的 SAML 授权机构的支持信息，是 类的一个使用示例。One example of how to use the class is to provide supporting information about the SAML authority issuing the SAML assertion. 这些支持信息的形式可以是 SAML 断言或对 SAML 断言的引用，这两种形式分别由 和 属性表示。This supporting information can be in the form of a SAML assertion or a reference to a SAML assertion, which are represented by the and properties, respectively.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
